**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 50 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 48 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 45 [Immense Mandragora](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2354) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 450 **Perception** +33; blood scent, [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)Languages Abyssal, Aklo, Common, Sylvan **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +38 **Str** +10 **Dex** +5 **Con** +6 **Int** +0 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +6 **Blood Scent** A mandragora can smell creatures with blood as an imprecise sense at a range of 30 feet, and it can smell [demons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), and sorcerers with blood as a precise sense at a range of 30 feet.
 --- **AC** 43 **Fort** +34 **Ref** +31 **Will** +35 **HP** 400 **Resistances** bludgeoning 20, electricity 20 **Weaknesses** fire 20 **Vulnerable to Supernatural Darkness** Whenever a mandragora begins its turn in an area of magical darkness, it is [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) 1 on that turn. --- **Speed** 40 feet, burrow 10 feet, climb 40 feet **Melee** jaws +38, **Damage** 4d12+18 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Melee** thorny vine +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+18 slashing plus immense mandragora venom **Blood Drain** **Requirements** The immense mandragora has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect The** immense mandragora drains blood from the creature it has grabbed, dealing 12d6 damage. If the creature is a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), or sorcerer, the mandragora gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. A creature that has its blood drained by a mandragora is [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) 2 until it receives healing of any kind or amount. **Immense Mandragora Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 42 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 damage and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison damage, [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), and stupefied 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison damage, confused, and stupefied 1 (1 round) **Apocalyptic Shriek** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The immense mandragora emits a devastating shriek. Each non-mandragora creature within 30 feet must attempt a DC 42 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) 1 and takes 8d8 mental damage.
**Failure** The creature is sickened 2 and takes 16d8 mental damage.
**Critical Failure** The creature is sickened 2, slowed 1, and takes 150 mental damage. As long as the creature remains sickened, this slowed condition value can't be reduced below 1.
name: Immense Mandragora
